scripts.copyzkey: rsync -Pv -e "ssh -i $HOME/.ssh/$(pulumi config get sshPubKeyName)" ../apis/prove/generated/circuit.zkey ubuntu@$(pulumi stack output publicIp):/home/ubuntu/e2e-zk-ecdsa/apis/prove/generated/
scripts.deploy: pulumi up -y && pnpm removeknownhost && pnpm copyzkey
scripts.ssh.reset: pnpm removeknownhost && ssh -i ~/.ssh/$(pulumi config get sshPubKeyName) ubuntu@$(pulumi stack output publicIp)
scripts.ssh: ssh -i ~/.ssh/$(pulumi config get sshPubKeyName) ubuntu@$(pulumi stack output publicIp)
scripts.start.manual: ssh -i ~/.ssh/$(pulumi config get sshPubKeyName) ubuntu@$(pulumi stack output publicIp) 'cd /home/ubuntu/e2e-zk-ecdsa/apis/prove && nohup /home/ubuntu/.volta/bin/node dist >> stdout.log 2>> stderr.log'
